name: function 5
Insert Data
query:
INSERT INTO master_sku (item_no,family,subfamily,item_name, vendor, price, image,filename,image_type) 
VALUES ('{{msg.item_no}}', '{{msg.family}}', '{{msg.subfamily}}', '{{msg.item_name}}', '{{msg.vendor}}', {{msg.price}},'{{msg.image}}',
'{{msg.filename}}','{{msg.type}}')

name: function 7
Preview
Display image
Get Data All
query:
SELECT item_no, family, subfamily, item_name, vendor, price, encode(image, 'base64') AS image,filename, image_type
FROM master_sku order by family

name: array
Get Image
query:
SELECT item_no, family, subfamily, item_name, vendor, price, encode(image, 'base64') AS image,filename, image_type
FROM master_sku
Where item_no='{{msg.item_no}}'

name: function 193
array
function 194
function 195
Update Data
query:
UPDATE master_sku 
SET item_no='{{msg.item_no}}', family='{{msg.family}}', subfamily='{{msg.subfamily}}', 
item_name='{{msg.item_name}}', vendor ='{{msg.vendor}}', price={{msg.price}},
image='{{msg.image}}',filename='{{msg.filename}}',image_type='{{msg.type}}'
WHERE item_no='{{msg.prev_item_no}}'

name: function 196
Update Data
query:
UPDATE master_sku 
SET item_no='{{msg.item_no}}', family='{{msg.family}}', subfamily='{{msg.subfamily}}', 
item_name='{{msg.item_name}}', vendor ='{{msg.vendor}}', price={{msg.price}}
WHERE item_no='{{msg.prev_item_no}}'

name: Get Data All
query:
SELECT item_no, family, subfamily, item_name, vendor, price,filename, image_type
FROM master_sku order by family

name: array
Get Data Family
query:
SELECT distinct family
FROM master_sku order by family

name: function 197
Get Data Sub
query:
SELECT distinct subfamily
FROM master_sku
WHERE family='{{msg.payload}}'

name: function 198
Get Data All
query:
SELECT item_no, family, subfamily, item_name, vendor, price,filename, image_type
FROM master_sku
WHERE family='{{msg.payload}}'

name: array
Get Data All
query:
SELECT item_no, family, subfamily, item_name, vendor, price,filename, image_type
FROM master_sku
WHERE family='{{msg.family}}'
AND subfamily='{{msg.payload}}'

name: Get Image
query:
SELECT item_no, family, subfamily, item_name, vendor, price, encode(image, 'base64') AS image,filename, image_type
FROM master_sku
Where item_no='{{msg.item_no}}'
